text:
Hi !
Can i add hidden field on "Embed Widget Meeting"? it's possible with form module, but i dont found this on "Embed Widget Meeting".

<@U01CNKLH30C> - I haven't tested this, but I think that you could remove the `inlineEmbedSelector:'#chat'` from the settings, and then still have your click event listeners that fire the other portions of the js (i.e. loading/refreshing/closing)

Interacting with the chat is no problem and the launcher doesnâ€™t interfere with that, so that would make sense. All I need is for the launcher and chat to be rendered separately, so they can be shown or hidden individually. Will give this a try soon-ish :thumbsup:
